title: Brace yourself: Phones and other tech may become harder to get as Shenzhen goes into lockdown
content:
A fresh wave of lockdown in China’s Shenzhen is, once again, threatening to bring the supply chain to a standstill. Major manufacturers, including Foxconn, have been forced to suspend production in the city, which could delay shipments of smartphones and other tech products. According to a recent report fromÂ Nikkei Asia, the Shenzen government has halted

The post Brace yourself: Phones and other tech may become harder to get as Shenzhen goes into lockdown appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Shenzhen government has imposed a city-wide lockdown due to a sudden spike in COVID-19 cases. Read on to learn more about the impact of the latest lockdown.
